name: User Profile & Preference Generator
description: Generates user profile system for preferences and customization
why: To store user preferences for recommendations, search settings, and UI customization
outputPrompt:
Generate the User Profile & Preference system:

1. **Model (backend/app/models/user_profile.py)**:
   - UserProfile: id, user_id, preferred_classifications (JSON list), excluded_sources (JSON list), recommendation_settings (JSON), search_preferences (JSON), created_at, updated_at
   - Add unique constraint on user_id

2. **Service (backend/app/services/user_profile_service.py)**:
   - get_or_create_profile(user_id)
   - update_preferences(user_id, updates)
   - get_filtered_recommendations(user_id) — respect excluded sources and classification preferences

3. **Endpoints (backend/app/api/user_profiles.py)**:
   - GET /users/{user_id}/profile
   - PUT /users/{user_id}/profile
   - GET /users/{user_id}/recommendations — filtered by profile

Ensure proper user authentication and authorization checks.
